title: General Chaos Uncensored Animation
description:
This torrent was created because of how godamn long it took me to download 3 gigs for
a rar file containing incredibly huge Mpeg files! I converted all mpeg files into avi
and joined them together with Virtualdub making a total runtime of 1 hr and 11 min and
a 533 mb file size! Enjoy this rip the way it was ment to be!

"WARNING!  THIS PROGRAM CONTAINS VULGAR, SICK, TWISTED, DEMENTED, CRAZY, RUDE, 
OFFENSIVE, CRUDE, BAD, NAUGHTY, UNCOUTH, ILL-MANNERED, AND WILDLY ORIGINAL ANIMATION!


Intended for adults with a delinquent inner child, GENERAL CHAOS UNCENSORED ANIMATION 
provides a great escape from political correctness.  This collection of short films 
spans the edges of animation technology and style, adn the content runs from downright 
disturbing to completely offensive.  Plenty of sex, tons of violence and enough 
subversive humor for even the most twisted mind.  and the language... forget about it!  
Features forty original animated shorts from around the world."
 -Tape Case


"...funny disturbing and perverted"
 -Film Threat


"This is some of the funniest shit you'll ever see.  Everyone needs to watch it!"
 -matt22881
